title: Currently D2 ADC - LF Duo D3+ Support
body: Hi my IGN is ecotoxic I would like to think that most of time I play pretty well in the ADC role, and thusly looking for a Support main that is Diamond 3 and above to duo with. Someone going to be on a lot so we can play a lot together. My favourite ADC's at the moment are Jinx, Graves, Lucian, Tristana, Corki and Sivir. I would prefer if you can play Supports like Janna, Morgana, Nami, and Thresh. Others like Blitzcrank, Leona etc also all good. I want us to have fun but our main goal is winning and hauling in that elo. Add me if you are interested, no need posting here.

replies.body: My bad on double posting, I've deleted the other one.
